abstract: Great vlog!! You are far more photogenic than you give yourself credit for. ;)
I think you're ready for GQ now..great vlog. I'll def look them up next time im in Paris. Thanks ladies.
Some great shots, the one shown right after coffee is a show winner. Those girls are very good.
